house_listing.house_location: 604 Sandy Harbor Drive Marble Falls, TEXAS 78654
house_listing.house_description: This is an ideal "Getaway lake Home." It has two living areas and the downstairs recreation room/bedroom has a wet bar and is large enough for entertaining and guests. Three bedroom, two and a half baths, boat house with lift on a sheltered cove just a short distance from Lake LBJ open water. Seperate living room with stone fireplace, large kitchen/family room. This home did not flood during the Memorial Day flood of 1995!

highlights.item: Boat house with lift on inlet cove of Lake LBJ.
Living room w/fireplace, large kitchen, family roo
